title: Number of U.S. Pinterest users 2017 , by gender
summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Sex, and Number of users in millions in each Sex on the y axis.
The Number of users in millions is highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
The difference of Number of users in millions between the highest and lowest Sex is 26.3.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of users in millions for 2 number of Sexs.
The Number of users in millions is highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Sex, and Number of users in millions in each Sex on the y axis.
The Number of users in millions is highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
The difference of Number of users in millions between the highest and lowest Sex is 26.3.
max_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Sex, and Number of users in millions in each Sex on the y axis.
The Number of users in millions is appeared to be the highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
The difference of Number of users in millions between the highest and lowest Sex is 26.3.
The Sex Female has 1.29 times more Number of users in millions than average.
